name: The Ability to Find
description:
"The Ability to Find" is an emotional short story about a person with the ability to find lost things. Whenever they touch a lost object, they have visions related to its memory, which could be a blessing or a curse. 

This is the first game I made all by myself from scratch, excluding the music which was created by Abakauê. That means I wrote the story, made all the illustrations AND programmed it using Ren'Py! It's more of a story than a game since there aren't really any mechanics, but I did everything in five days for Global Game Jam 2021 and I'm super proud of it nonetheless! 

I hope you like it! And, if you do, please leave a comment, it means a lot to me <3
